answers.answer: It really depends, I guess. My first was 2 weeks early and he was 8lbs 4oz. If the GB did affect your first child, then your second could be smaller. But maybe you just have bigger babies? Does your doc think you will have a big baby again?
Every baby is different so it is hard to know.

question: Hi everyone... I am currently 32wks pregnant with my second child (another boy). Back in 2005 I became pregnant with my first son but at 28wks was diagnosed with Gestational Diabetes, was able to control my sugar with diet but stil had an 8lb6oz healthy boy... My question is if this pregnancy is going better... I tested negative for gestational Diabetes... would I still have a larger baby or could there be a chance this baby could be smaller?
title: Have question re: second babies being larger?
